body.p: During its discussions on this issue, the Board noted that for the purpose of applying the disclosure requirements in paragraphs 42E–42H of IFRS 7, continuing involvement as described in paragraph 42C of IFRS 7 has a different meaning from that used in paragraphs 3.2.6(c)(ii) and 3.2.16 of IFRS 9. The Board considered, but decided against, making a clarification in respect of this point because it thought that this difference was already clear from the description of continuing involvement in the two IFRSs.
